  onSelect(item) {

      typeId: item.id,
      page: 1,
    });
  },
});

onEdit â€‹

è¡¨å•ç¼–è¾‘æ—¶è§¦å‘ï¼Œè¿”å›å€¼ä¸ OpenOptions ä¸€è‡´

js
const { ViewGroup } = useViewGroup({
  onEdit(item) {
    return {
      title: "æ ‡é¢˜",
      width: "500px",
      props: {
        labelWidth: "60px",
      },
      items: [
        {
          label: "åç§°",
          prop: "name",
          component: {
            name: "el-input",
            props: {
              maxlength: 20,
            },
          },
          required: true,
        },
      ],
    };
  },
});

onContextMenu â€‹

é»˜è®¤å¸¦æœ‰ ç¼–è¾‘ å’Œ åˆ é™¤ã€‚å¦‚éœ€è‡ªå®šä¹‰å³é”®èœå•ï¼Œè¿”å›å€¼ä¸ cl-context-menu ä¸€è‡´ã€‚

js
const { ViewGroup } = useViewGroup({
  onContextMenu(item) {
    return {
      list: [
        {
          label: "ç¼–è¾‘",
          callback(done) {
            done();
            ViewGroup.value?.edit(item);
          },
        },
        {
          label: "åˆ é™¤",
          callback(done) {
            done();
            ViewGroup.value?.remove(item);
          },
        },
      ],
    };
  },
});

onData â€‹

å¤„ç†å·¦ä¾§åˆ—è¡¨æ•°æ®ï¼Œç”± service ä¸­çš„ page æ¥å£è¿”å›

js
const { ViewGroup } = useViewGroup({
  onData(list) {
    return list.map((e) => {
      return {
        ...e,
        name: "-" + e.name + "-",
      };
    });
  },
});
